tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Vehicle (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR(255),
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  last_usage_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE VehicleUsage (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES Vehicle(id),
  usage_type VARCHAR(50),
  usage_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  duration_minutes INT);

CREATE TABLE ResourceAllocation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  allocation_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES Vehicle(id),
  allocated_for VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE trip ( 
   trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   vehicle_id INT, 
   driver_id INT, 
   start_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
   end_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
   distance FLOAT 
 );
CREATE TABLE Vehicle ( vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_type VARCHAR(255), manufacturer VARCHAR(255), model VARCHAR(255), year INT, last_usage_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Driver ( driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), license_number VARCHAR(255), phone_number VARCHAR(20) )
CREATE TABLE Trip ( trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_id INT, driver_id INT, trip_date DATE, start_location VARCHAR(255), end_location VARCHAR(255), distance_km FLOAT, duration_minutes INT )
CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Record ( record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_id INT, maintenance_type VARCHAR(255), maintenance_date DATE, cost DECIMAL(10, 2) )

CREATE TABLE Resource_Allocation ( allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, trip_id INT, start_location VARCHAR(255), end_location VARCHAR(255), resource_type VARCHAR(255), resource_quantity INT, allocation_date DATE )
